attributes.action: strive for an equal level of compliance with european legislation from all EU member states.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst discussing the upcoming European elections with my family, it became apparent that none of us were particularly keen on voting for any party at the moment as we see Europe as being completely unfair.  If we are going to be part of Europe, which we all believed we should be, then all members should follow the regulations to the same degree.  We seem to be the only country to take EU regulations as law.  The rest pick and choose to what extent they will enforce these regulations.  This is particularly prevailant in the food industry..!
